unnormalised: "Arre yaar, this new flat is giving me a headache. Builder said it's 1200 sq ft, but feels smaller. The walls are only 4 inches thick – I measured myself! And the kitchen countertop? Promised 20 mm granite, looks more like 15 mm to me. Now I have to call him again. So much tension!"
normalised: "Arre yaar, this new flat is giving me a headache. Builder said it's one thousand two hundred square feet, but feels smaller. The walls are only four inches thick – I measured myself! And the kitchen countertop? Promised twenty millimeter granite, looks more like fifteen millimeter to me. Now I have to call him again. So much tension!"
